short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get user IP address, current location, time, and date with QuickIP Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickIP Chrome extension streamlines the retrieval of user data, encompassing their IP address, current location, time, and date. This tool is designed for efficiency, enabling swift access to essential information for diverse applications, from personalized website experiences to location-specific functionalities.
